description: This project demonstrates a stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in a Flask-based announcement board. The main goal is educational: to show how unsanitized HTML input can lead to client-side code execution and data theft (simulated admin cookie/flag access).
üîç Demonstrate the CVE-2025-32463 privilege-escalation flaw in sudo's chroot feature with this minimal, reproducible proof of concept environment.
üõ°Ô∏è Exploit Akamai's RepositoryService XXE vulnerability (CVE-2025-49493) with this testbed, aiding in secure coding practices and vulnerability assessments.
üîì Explore CVE-2025-31258 with this PoC demonstrating partial sandbox escape using RemoteViewServices for practical 1-day security practice.
üîç Create a safe lab environment for testing CVE-2020-0610, a critical RCE vulnerability in Windows RD Gateway, with minimal disruption using DTLS techniques.
1day practice - Escape macOS sandbox (partial) using RemoteViewServices

Glass Cage is a zero-click PNG-based RCE chain in iOS 18.2.1, exploiting WebKit (CVE-2025-24201) and Core Media (CVE-2025-24085) to achieve sandbox escape, kernel-level access, and device bricking. Triggered via iMessage, it enables full compromise with no user interaction.

Repository containing writeups of CTF machines from platforms like HackTheBox, HackMyVM, and VulNyx. It includes detailed steps for exploiting vulnerabilities, privilege escalation, and post-exploitation.

üîê Cybersecurity Lab Reports &amp; CTF Write-ups ‚Äì Reconnaissance, exploitation, privilege escalation, and mitigation strategies üõ†Ô∏è | My curated archive of hacking challenges, vulnerability assessments, and hands-on security research üìÇ
Repository Showcasing Practical/Hands-On Zero-Day Exploit Development and Techniques
üåôü¶ä Dalfox is a powerful open-source XSS scanner and utility focused on automation.
Google patched CVE-2025-10585, a Chrome V8 zero-day under active exploitation ‚Äî here‚Äôs what it is, why it matters, and how to stay safe.
Identify flaws (like SQL injection, hardcoded passwords, lack of input validation).
üõ†Ô∏è Reproduce and validate CVE-2025-3515 in a Dockerized WordPress lab to test unrestricted file uploads via the Contact Form 7 plugin.
A tiny flask app for helping red-teamers, purple teamers, and pentesters in delivery, data exfiltration, and some attacks (SSRF, XXE, XSS, Session Hijacking, Session Riding).
TOP All bugbounty pentesting CVE-2023- POC Exp  RCE example payload  Things
Fuel CMS 1.4 - Remote Code Execution
CloudGoat is Rhino Security Labs' &quot;Vulnerable by Design&quot; AWS deployment tool
This repository contains a Proof of Concept (PoC) for CVE-2024-28397, a vulnerability in the js2py library allowing a sandbox escape to achieve remote code execution.
CVE-2019-3396 confluence SSTI RCE
Analysis of an Unauthenticated Arbitrary File Write vulnerability in Wishlist Member plugin (&lt;=3.25.1) with potential RCE. Educational and responsible disclosure report.
Automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool
Repo for discovered public vulnerabilities &amp; corresponding CVEs
Windows 11 24H2 Runtime PatchGuard Bypass
üóúÔ∏è Compress, encrypt, and backup files easily with WinRAR, supporting multiple formats and ensuring secure file management for all your data needs.
Local privilege escalation vulnerability CVE-2025-32463 in Sudo allows users to gain root access. Discover details and solutions on GitHub! üêô‚ú®
WebKit Heap Use-After-Free Proof-of-Concept (PoC) https://dark-life944.github.io/poc/
Hacking Hotspots: Pre-Auth Remote Code Execution, Arbitrary SMS &amp; Adjacent Attacks on 5G &amp; 4G/LTE Routers
Web Browsers address bar spoofing vulnerabilities
Proof of Concept showing how browser autofill can leak hidden personal data (address, phone, etc.) even when only Name and Email fields are visible.
A vulnerability of arbitrary file deletion caused by directory traversal in the template management module

PoC showing unauthenticated remote code execution in Erlang/OTP SSH server. By exploiting a flaw in SSH protocol message handling, an attacker can execute arbitrary commands on the target without valid credentials.
A proof-of-concept (PoC) remote code execution (RCE) exploit targeting vulnerable applications that deserialize untrusted Python pickle objects.
a little script, that looks for ssh keys of users through a path traversal attack
PoC exploit for CVE-2024-28397 ‚Äì Remote Code Execution in pyload-ng via js2py sandbox escape

This repository serves as my dedicated research hub for zero-day vulnerabilities. It contains my personal findings, proof-of-concepts (PoCs), and ongoing security research on undisclosed vulnerabilities. The goal is to document, organize, and share my journey in vulnerability discovery and exploit development.
Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)

A research-focused archive of publicly disclosed Apple products zero-day vulnerabilities. This project summarizes CVEs, disclosure timelines, vendor advisories, and defensive mitigations. ‚ö†Ô∏è No exploit code included ‚Äî educational and defensive use only.

This repository provides a modified version of the original CVE-2017-6074 exploit (use-after-free in the Linux kernel DCCP subsystem), designed only to demonstrate Denial of Service (DoS) impact. An authenticated local user can trigger a kernel panic, causing a total loss of system availability.
Reproducible lab for CVE-2020-0610 (BlueGate) - Windows RD Gateway UDP/DTLS remote code execution vulnerability. Includes PowerShell scripts, setup guide, and nuclei template validation examples.
From Information Disclosure to RCE in Sitecore Experience Platform (XP)

This project demonstrates a stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in a Flask-based announcement board. The main goal is educational: to show how unsanitized HTML input can lead to client-side code execution and data theft (simulated admin cookie/flag access).
